productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 618 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade your life GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, and other PC components and accessories. As a perennial developer in PC and server hardware and solutions, GIGABYTE is poised to extend our scope in business servers and cloud systems with hardware and software solutions that integrate AI and AloT applications to allow customers to capture, analyze, and transform digital information into economic data, accelerating businesses' success from edge to cloud.

That which resonates with your life “Upgrade Your Life” is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We believe only technology made for you will speak to you. With a keen understanding of your needs, we have raised industry standards with game-changing DualBIOS technology; our patented Ultra Durable motherboards are designed to last and outlast, and our superior Windforce Stack 3x Cooling System exceeds all expectations. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today.

When ideas manifest into reality We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. We have set the foundations for future forays into machine learning (AI) and deep learning. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity. From the adrenaline-pumping AORUS eSport line for enthused gamers, to cutting-edge AERO laptops for inspired artists and creators, or portable yet powerful BRIX mini PCs, with your perspective in mind, we crafted technologies that have more realistic usability to make the future both achievable and approachable.

Foretelling your future in tech Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Even your appliances are online, working to make your life easier. AI assures that you always have personalized entertainment options. Blockchain has reshaped the financial world, and medical marvels take place daily with the help of VR. What you're visualizing is already approaching reality, and the world will soon rush to keep up. Now is the time to Upgrade Your Life. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Allowed XUbuntu to run on MSI motherboard
reviews.reviewText: I installed XUbuntu Linux on a PC with an MSI H67MA-E45 (B3) motherboard.The system was unstable, with Xwindows returning to its logon screen when too many windows were open, specifically when there were too many Firefox tabs open or playing Youtube videos.No matter the BIOS setting, the machine was running out of shared video memory, something that might have been managed by a software driver if the machine was running MS Windows.Based on an Internet search, I found this GT 730 card well reviewed and a reasonably priced solution for an older machine not having a video power connector.The install was easy, and the machine is now stable. It will never be fast enough for gaming, but works well enough for email and Internet access.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Budget GPU
reviews.reviewText: I built a basic home computer and it needed a GPU with at least 2 GB of RAM and Windows 11 compatible. This card fits the need. It has been installed and is working very well. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fast enough for my needs - just too wide
reviews.reviewText: I don't use my PC for gaming and was looking for an equivalent card for the one that's non-replaceable cooling fan died.It was a struggle to get into the graphics slot because the fan and heat sink made it larger than 1 slot wide. The fan pushes on the WiFi adapter in the PCIe slot next to it, bending both cards away from each other. As it doesn't interfere with the heat sink side of the WiFi adapter, and the fan on the video card may cool the WiFi a bit, I'll see how it goes, but I'm not happy about the fit. I can see why the width isn't given.It's a full height card and won't fit into any SFF cases,It appeared to run at 100% of the video settings from the old GTForce 710 NVidia card that it replaced. I installed the Gigabyte drivers and Adrus Engine anyway and accepted the defaults.In HWMonitor I can now watch the GPU fan RPM that I couldn't do on the old card.4 stars - plays videos OK but not for gaming and a bit wide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cumple con lo descrito
reviews.reviewText: para gaming basico esta bien, pero la use solo para dar video en varias para un circuito de tv cerrado, muy buena compra vale el dinero

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic Economy Graphic Card For Average Computer Builder
reviews.reviewText: This is an older card, but I'm not a gamer and I couldn't use my 12 year old video card in the new build. I ordered this once I re-built my old PC and realized screen would't come on with the ancient graphics card I had. It serves my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for using Davinci Resolve
reviews.reviewText: I had an urgent video editing and just updated Davinci Resolve, of course I didn't care about creating a project data base (I'll never do that again)When opening the software I needed now I wouldn't able to use it because I dint have a graphics card. I wasn't able to restore old version since I needed to erase all info and My project was almost done.I got this card and I installed it myself (never done that). It was easyWorks perfectly. But I can notice a little bit of issues while opening 2 videos on HD or 4K, my mother board didn't have issues at all. But I can use Davinci so I'm okay with that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need a monitor with an hdmi port to run this
reviews.reviewText: My wife's dell would not run vital rendered games like house flipper. With this it now plays her games and her download speeds have increased tremendously. We are not tech savvy by any means and this took us less then 10 mins to install. At first the computer said it was not compatible with the graphics card but that was a simple fix when I learned I needed to run an hdmi from the new card to my monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for a basic video card
reviews.reviewText: I'm using this for in a PC repurposed for business use, so it's not going to do any gaming. For ordinary business use, it's fine. I'm using the latest NVIDIA driver that I downloaded from their website. I haven't experimented with it much yet, but so far I haven't been able to get it to do 1920x1080 (full HD) resolution. It's a step or two below that. But it works just fine, and I'm pretty happy with this, considering the low price.It's very short, and occupies only one slot. So it will fit easily even in a small computer case. (But not a micro-sized case.) It has one low profile fan. It has signal ports for DVI, VGA, and HDMI. I don't know if it can run two monitors at once; I didn't try that.
Llegó en tiempo estimado, bien precio y sobre todo muy buen producto, compatible con nuestras necesidades, jaló a la primera y la computadora en la que se instaló por fin puede trabajar mejor

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and works as expected
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and works as expected
Excelente funcionamiento.Práctica económico para modelos viejitos de cpu. Económica.
Se desempeña muy bien, cumple con au funcion, sin duda la compraria de nuevo
